data.name: XO Evolved
data.detailed_description:
XO Evolved is an "evolution" of Tic-Tac-Toe! It takes the strategic, basic three-in-a-row game and propels it to an all-new board game of full strategy and options. Taking inspiration from both the classic Tic-Tac-Toe game and the collectable card game genre, XO Evolved elevates Tic-Tac-Toe into a more complex and strategy based board game while also retaining that simple, classic feel.

To win in XO Evolved, it won't just be a "three in a row" to finish the game. Players will fight head-to-head utilizing special card effects to gain an edge on the board. Mirrors and lasers will occupy the board to be manipulated by each player to reach victory. To win, you won't just be using your cards and flipping mirrors to be the first to match three shapes in a row. XO Evolved requires the players to match as many of their shapes in a "three in a row" to have the highest number of sets when the board is full. Along with cards, lasers, and mirrors, XO Evolved offers customization to players to make the game truly their own. XO Evolved supports any way of play, allowing players to change the time limit of a match, the board, the cards used, and more!

FEATURES:
- Local 2 player head to head
- Remote Multiplayer with chat
- Game piece cosmetics
- Wide variety of card abilities to fit your play style
- Control of match settings
- CPU opponent
- Collect all the cards!

data.short_description: XO evolved is a revolutionary new twist to the game of tic tac toe. XO Evolved is a much more complex and strategic version of tic tac toe, featuring more shapes, exciting mechanics such as lasers, and cards with special effects to turn the tide of the game.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows '95
  • Processor: 512 mHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Storage: 128 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 3.2 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Do not run in a Virtual Machine

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
